name: Counters
hint: Display who counters the specified hero!

name: Synergies
hint: Display who synergizes with the specified hero!

name: Builds
hint: Display the known builds for the specified hero!

name: Banlist
hint: Display suggested heroes to ban on ranked

name: Map
hint: Display all available maps or the heroes that are usually stronger on a specified map, depending on the received parameters

name: Help
hint: Display useful hints for all commands

name: FreeWeek
hint: Display which heroes are currently free week

name: Infos
hint: Display information about the specified hero, like its universe, tier position, score, builds, counters, synergies and tips

name: Tips
hint: Display useful tips for the hero

name: Suggest
hint: Find the top 10 heroes by filters sorted by their score based on QUICKMATCH
